content:
けがらわしい〔穢らわしい〕
〈形〉Filthy; foul; abominable; polluting; contaminating

content.content: そんなけがらわしい話は聴かぬ
I will not listen to such filthy talk―such foul talk.
そんな話は止してくれ、聞くもけがらわしい
Stop that talk! It is abominable to hear.
この花札を持って行け、見るもけがらわしい
Take these cards away! They are abominable to see.
その国にはけがらわしい風俗がある
That country has some abominable customs.
お前のような奴にはものを言うのもけがらわしい
It is a pollution to talk to you.
あんな奴と席を同じうするのもけがらわしい
It is a contamination to sit at the same table with such a fellow.
賄賂のようなけがらわしい物は取らぬ
I will not pollute my hand with a bribe―contaminate my fingers with a bribe.

content:
けがれ〔穢れ〕
〈名〉Pollution; contamination; defilement; impurity; a stain; a blot

content.content: この家名のけがれ、武門のけがれだ
It is a blot on his escutcheon.
名誉のけがれだ
It is a stain upon his honour.
操のけがれ無き婦人だ
She is without a spot on her honour.
賄賂を取っては手のけがれだ
I will not pollute my hand with a bribe―contaminate my fingers with a bribe.
そんなものを見ると目のけがれだ
It will pollute my eyes to look at such a thing.
そんな話を聞くと耳のけがれだ
I will contaminate my ears to listen to such talk.
あんな人間と交わると品性のけがれだ
It will defile my character to associate with such a man.
あんな人間は人類のけがれだ
Such a man is a stain to humanity.
けがれを秡い清める
to purge a person or a place from impurities―purge the heart of sin

content:
けがれた〔穢れた〕
〈形〉Polluted (hands); contaminated (food); defiled (well); sullied (honour); unclean (body); impure (girl); unchaste (woman)

content.content: けがれた手で扱うと罰が当たる
It is a profanation to handle it with unclean hands.

content:
けがれる〔穢れる〕
〈自動〉To become unclean; to be polluted; to be contaminated; to be defiled

content.content: 賄賂を取っては手がけがれる
I will not pollute my hand with a bribe―contaminate my fingers with a bribe.
そんなものを見ると目がけがれる

そんな話を聞くと耳がけがれる

あんな人間と交わると品性がけがれる
Such company will defile my character.

Your presence pollutes the house―Do not pollute the house with your presence!
その手はけがれている
Those hands are polluted―Those hands are unclean.
この食物はけがれている
The food is contaminated.
この井戸はけがれている
The well is defiled.
あの女はけがれている
She is impure―unchaste―She has lost her purity―lost her chastity.
あの女はけがれておらぬ
She is pure―chaste―She has preserved her purity―preserved her chastity.

content:

content.content: 毛皮の帽子

〈名〉The drama; a play:(=の) dramatic

content:
げき〔隙〕
〈名〉
1. (=すきま)a crevice; a chink; an interstice; a space; a gap
2. (=機会)an opportunity

content.content: 隙に乗ずる
to seize the opportunity

content: 3. (=不和)discord; a difference

content.content: 隙を生ずる
A difference arises.

content:
げき〔檄〕
〈名〉A manifesto

content.content: 檄を飛ばす
to circulate a manifesto―send round the fiery cross

げきかい〔劇界〕
〈名〉The dramatic world

content:
げきご〔激語〕
〈名〉Violent language; strong language

content.content: 激語を吐く、激語を放つ
to break out into violent language

content:
げきこう〔激昂〕
〈名〉→『

content.content: げっこう〔激昂〕

げきさつする〔撃殺する〕
〈他動〉To shoot (one) dead

げきし〔劇詩〕
〈名〉A dramatic poem:(総称すれば)dramatic poetry

げきしやすい〔激し易い〕
〈形〉Excitable (people)

げきじょう〔劇場〕
〈名〉A theatre; a playhouse

content:
げきしょうする〔激賞する〕
〈他動〉To speak highly of (one); to extol (anything) to the skies; to sing one's praises; to be loud in one's praise; to be warm in one's praise

content.content: 皆今度の先生を激賞している
They speak of the new man in high terms―They are loud in the praise of the new man.

content:
げきしん〔激震〕
〈名〉A severe earthquake; a severe shock

content.content: 昨夜激震があった
A severe shock was felt last night.
時計が止まるほどの激震であった
The shock was so severe that the clocks stopped.

content:
げきじん〔劇甚〕
〈形〉Intense (heat or cold); violent (pain); severe (blow); furious (gale); fierce (anger, etc.)

content.content: 炎威劇甚
The heat is intense.

content:
げきする〔激する〕
〈自動〉To chafe; to get excited; to be irritated; to be incensed; to be provoked; to be aggravated; to be exasperated; to be infuriated; to fire up; to frame up; to flare up

content.content: 皆激している
They are excited―They are in a heat―Their blood is up.
彼の言に大いに激した
I was incensed by his words―I fired up at his words.
彼は虐待されて激している
He chafes against ill-usage.
非常に激して議論をしておった
They were arguing at a white heat.
つい激したはずみに失礼な事を申しましたろう
You will excuse me for the hasty words which must have escaped me in the heat of the argument―in the heat of the debate―in the heat of the moment.
日本人は激しやすい
The Japanese are an excitable people.
激せず人を殺すは無残
It is cruel to murder a man in cold blood.

content:
げきせい〔激性〕
〈形〉Drastic (cathartic); malignant (cholera, etc.)

content.content: 激性の病
a malignant disease
激性の薬
a drastic medicine

content:
げきせん〔激戦〕
〈名〉A sanguinary battle; severe fighting; hot work; a hot job:(競争などを形容して言えば)a sharp contest; hard knocks

content.content: 激戦が有った
A sanguinary battle was fought―We had severe fighting.
激戦になりそうだ
We are likely to have hot work―a hot job.
選挙競争は激戦であった
The election was sharply contested.

げきぞう〔激増〕
〈名〉A sudden increase:(=する) to increase suddenly

content:
げきたい〔撃退〕
〈名〉A repulse:(=する) to repulse, repel (the attack or the attacking enemy); to beat back, beat off (the enemy)

content.content: 撃退される
to meet with a repulse―suffer a repulse

げきたく〔撃柝〕
〈名〉A stroke of clappers

content:
げきだん〔劇壇〕
〈名〉The stage

content.content: 劇壇に立つ
to go on the stage

げきちんする〔撃沈する〕
〈他動〉To sink (a ship); to send (a ship) to the bottom

げきつう〔劇通〕
〈名〉An authority on dramatic affairs

content:
げきつう〔激痛〕
〈名〉Acute pain; a pang

content.content: 激痛を感ずる
to feel a pang

content:
げきてつ〔撃鉄〕
〈名〉The cock; the hammer

content.content: 撃鉄を上げる
to cock a gun

げきど〔激度〕
〈名〉Intensity; severity; violence

げきど〔激怒〕
〈名〉Fury; rage:(=する) to get into a rage; to fly into a passion; to be furious; to be mad; to be savage; to fire up; to flame up; to flare up

げきどう〔劇道〕
〈名〉The dramatic art

げきどう〔激動〕
〈名〉Agitation; convulsion:(=する) to be agitated; to be convulsed

げきはする〔撃破する〕
〈他動〉To defeat, rout (the enemy)

げきはつ〔激発〕
〈名〉
1. (=人を激せしむること)provocation; exasperation:(=する) to provoke, exasperate (a man)
2. (=烈しく怒ること)explosion:(=する) to fly into a passion; to fire up; to flame up; to flare up

content:
げきひょう〔劇評〕
〈名〉Dramatic criticism

content.content: 劇評家
a dramatic critic

content:
げきぶん〔檄文〕
〈名〉A manifesto

content.content: 檄文を草す
to draw up a manifesto

げきぶんがく〔劇文学〕
〈名〉Dramatic literature

content:
げきへん〔激変〕
〈名〉A violent change; a sudden change:(=する) to undergo a sudden change

content.content: 激変を起こす
to work a sudden change

content:
げきむ〔劇務、激務〕
〈名〉
1. (=繁劇)press of business

content.content: 劇務に忙殺されている
We are worked to death by press of business.

content: 2. (=繁劇な職務)a busy office

content.content: 劇務に堪えぬ
to sink under the strain
老年劇務に堪えず
He is old and unfit for a busy office.

content:
げきむ〔劇務、激務〕
〈名〉
1. (=繁劇)press of business

content.content: 劇務に忙殺されている
We are worked to death by press of business.

content: 2. (=繁劇な職務)a busy office

content.content: 劇務に堪えぬ
to sink under the strain
老年劇務に堪えず
He is old and unfit for a busy office.

げきめつする〔撃滅する〕
〈他動〉To destroy, annihilate (the enemy)

content:
げきやく〔劇薬〕
〈名〉A drastic medicine; a poison

content.content: 瓶に劇薬という札が貼ってある
The phial is labelled as poison.

content:
けぎらい〔毛嫌い〕
〈名〉Antipathy; prejudice:(=する) to have an antipathy to (some one); to be prejudiced against (some one)

content.content: 生徒が先生を毛嫌いする
The students have an antipathy to some teachers―They are prejudiced against some teachers.

げきりゅう〔激流〕
〈名〉A torrent

content:
げきりん〔逆鱗〕
〈名〉Imperial wrath

content.content: 逆鱗に触れる
to incur the Imperial wrath―offend the Emperor―(転用すれば)―offend a man in power―incur one's displeasure

content:
げきれいする〔激励する〕
〈他動〉To urge (one to do something); to spur, goad, egg, edge (one) on (to action―to do something)

content.content: 彼は部下を激励して奮闘した
He urged his men to fight hard.
激励演説
a harangue
激励演説をする
to harangue the men

content:
げきれつ〔激烈〕
〈形〉Drastic (medicine); intense (heat or cold); violent (pain); severe (earthquake); furious (gale); fierce (anger); vehement (language); sanguinary (battle); sharp (contest); keen (competition); acute (pain)

content.content: 非常な場合には激烈な手段を用いなければならぬ
We must resort to drastic measures under exceptional circumstances.
新聞が彼を激烈に攻撃した
The papers attacked him vehemently―with vehemence―in vehement language.

content:
げきろう〔激浪〕
〈名〉The raging waters

content.content: 激浪天を衝く
The raging waters rise sky-high.
暴風激浪を起こす
The gale lashes the sea into fury.

content:
げきろん〔激論〕
〈名〉A heated discussion; a hot argument:(世間のなら)a violent controversy:(討論のなら)a stormy debate:(=する) to argue hotly; to discuss (the question) at a white heat

content.content: 激論が始まっていた
A heated discussion was going on.
激論があった
There were high words―Words ran high.
口角泡を飛ばして激論した
He argued with spluttering violence.

げぐう〔下宮〕
〈名〉The Outer Shrine of Ise

げけつ〔下血〕
〈名〉A bloody flux:(=する) to have a bloody flux

content:
けげん〔怪訝〕
〈形〉Dubious

content.content: けげんな顔
a dubious look―a dubious countenance
彼はけげんな顔をして僕の説明を聴いていた
He listened to me with a dubious countenance.

げげんのつき〔下弦の月〕
〈名〉The waning moon

content:
げこ〔下戸〕
〈名〉A man of temperate habits; a temperate man; a teetotaller

content.content: 君は上戸、僕は下戸
You go in for liquor―I go in for sweets.
下戸の建てたる倉も無し
A man was never known to make a fortune by abstaining from wine.
酔醒めの
How sweet water is to those
水の旨さを
Who wake up from a drunken doze,
下戸知らず
No teetotaller knows.

げこうする〔下向する〕
〈自動〉To go down (from the capital into the provinces)

けこみ〔蹴込み〕
〈名〉The floor (of a jinrikisha)

けころす〔蹴殺す〕
〈他動〉To kick (one) to death

けころばす〔蹴転ばす〕
〈他動〉To kick (one) down

けごろも〔毛衣〕
〈名〉A fur robe

content:
けさ〔袈裟〕
〈名〉A scapulary (worn by Buddhist priests over the sacerdotal robe)

content.content: 坊主が憎くけりゃ袈裟まで憎い、坊主が可愛いけりゃ袈裟まで可愛い
“Love me, love my dog.”
袈裟がけに斬る
to cut one aslant through the shoulder

content:
けさ〔今朝〕
〈名、副〉This morning

content.content: 今朝着いた
I arrived this morning.
今朝からここに居る
I have been here since morning.

げざ〔下座〕
〈名〉
1. (=座を下って平伏すること)drawing back from one's seat:(=する) to draw back from one's seat and do obeisance
2. (=舞台の右手)the prompt-side of the stage
